'''2.1.1462''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on October 23, 2018.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-9718}}: Launcher does not allow uploading skin files larger than 8kb.
* {{bug|MCL-9769}}: Some buttons change their width when hovering over them.
